entry.title: Kiyomizudera・清水寺
entry.content:
Construction on the roof of Kyoto’s famous Kiyomizudera is now complete and the temple looks great, just in time for cherry blossom season. In fact, you can see buds on the cherry trees in the lower half of this picture.

You can see the structure that was covering the temple in this photo from 2018.
